channel.title: Timer
channel.description: so im making a sleeping sytem where you click the beds and it resets for health and stats to full but i want t so you can only do it every 1h how would i do this ? and if you know the item model for this bed 417 plz tell me

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Step 1. Create a token (preferably a boolean, but an integer is fine too) that holds data that tells whether the player is sleeping or not. We need this so it saves the data upon logout.

Step 2. Create a token that holds data for the AMOUNT OF TIME LEFT that a player cannot use the bed for.

Step 3. Create a task that counts down the amount of time a player has left to be able to sleep in the bed

Read full topic

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Make it so whenever you rest, it sets a boolean false (canSleep), and a timer begins for one hour. After that hour, set it so the boolean becomes true.

Read full topic
